content: Robin Kravets | Siebel School of Computing and Data Science | Illinois Robin Kravets Robin Kravets Professor (217) 244-6026 rhk@illinois.edu 3114 Siebel Center for Comp Sci For More Information The Mobius Group Education Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA, Ph.D. Computer Science, August 1999 Research Areas Security and Privacy Systems and Networking Recent Courses TaughtCS 438 (ECE 438) - Communication Networks CS 498 WN3 (CS 498 WN4) - Wireless IoT Lab CS 591 PH2 (CS 591 PHD) - PHD Orientation Seminar CS 591 SCH - PhD Job Search Prep CS 591 WN - Wireless Networking Seminar ECE 439 (CS 439) - Wireless Networks ENG 572 - Professional Practicum Related News Illinois CS Places 28 Faculty on CITL List of Teachers Ranked as Excellent By Their Students 2022 Celebration of Excellence Brought CS Students, Faculty, Alumni, and Staff Together Again to Honor the Capabilities of This Community Community Without a Classroom: 'We Will Try Everything We Can to Make a Difference' Illinois, IBM Ready to Push the Boundaries of What's Possible in Computing Illinois Welcomes Rising Stars 2019 Illinois Funded by Google on Innovative Mobile-First, Open Web of Things Initiatives News Notes 12/16/2024CS faculty and students won multiple awards at ACM MobiCom 2024, the leading mobile computing and networking research conference. CS professor Deepak Vasisht was named a distinguished reviewer. Undergrad Jizheng He, advised by CS professor Elahe Soltanaghai, won the student research competition, PhD student Federico Cifuentes-Urtubey and CS professor Robin Hillary Kravets won the best poster award, and PhD student Jay Shenoy and Vasisht won the best community contribution award.
